comments.body:
I have tried using 1.5.15 plexus-utils. 

It now replaces double quotes with single quotes. Shell used in Bash.

Are there any work arounds to make this like the argument is enclosed in double quotes irrespective of the shell in use??

Related issue in SCM is [SCM-514|http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/SCM-514]
Please refer to https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/The+Great+JIRA+Cleanup+of+2014 if you're wondering why this issue was closed out.
